column1: #Text=Zuko says : " The intense cold prevents her from firebending . "
#Text=Desna says : " There 's certainly no way anyone 's breaking out of here . "
#Text=Zuko says : " That 's what we thought about the other three prisons . "
#Text=P'Li says : " There must be something exciting going on .
#Text=" P'Li says : " He 's out , is n't he ?
